name: DMN (Hush)
author: DMN Creative

sections.description:
The DMN (Hush) plugin provides an easy way to disable comments on all post types in WordPress, including posts, pages, and custom post types. This is useful if you do not want to allow comments on your site, or if you want to disable comments for a specific period of time.

The plugin also removes all options related to comments from the WordPress dashboard, including the ability to enable comments on individual posts or pages. This helps to simplify the dashboard and prevent any confusion for users who may not be familiar with WordPress.

The DMN (Hush) plugin can be easily activated and deactivated from the WordPress dashboard, and requires no additional configuration or setup.
sections.installation: Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
sections.faq:
Can I still enable comments on specific posts or pages?

No. This plugin removes all options related to comments from the WordPress dashboard, and disables comments on all post types.

Will this plugin remove existing comments from my site?

No. This plugin only disables comments on your site, and does not remove any existing comments.

How do I re-enable comments on my site?

Simply deactivate the DMN (Hush) plugin from the WordPress dashboard. This will restore all options related to comments and enable comments on all post types.
